rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious foyer leading to the living spaces with an open-plan design that respects Vastu principles by aligning entry towards the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large area for social gatherings with natural light from south-facing windows and an adjoining balcony.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Separate dining space adjacent to the living room that integrates a balcony for fresh air.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with privacy in mind, featuring a balcony facing east for natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: An expansive master bedroom with an attached balcony for relaxation and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A quiet study area that can double as a library space with views of the garden.

rooms.name: Family Room/Playroom
rooms.description: Multipurpose room for family activities that can be used for play or as an extra living space.

rooms.name: Utility/Service Area
rooms.description: A compact area for laundry, storage and service functions.

openings.name: Balconies
openings.description: Each bedroom features an attached balcony to ensure ample ventilation and natural light.

openings.name: Rooftop Terrace Access
openings.description: A staircase leading from the ground floor to the rooftop terrace.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a private balcony that overlooks the garden area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom with a balcony, ensuring privacy and ample sunlight.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom space with a small balcony for relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Final bedroom of the upper floor with a balcony offering views.

rooms.name: Balcony Connect
rooms.description: Connective walkway linking the bedrooms with their respective balconies.

openings.name: Balcony Openings
openings.description: Each bedroom's balcony is individually designed for optimum natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: An expansive terrace offering panoramic views of the surroundings with space for a swimming pool area and relaxation zones.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Area
openings.description: A dedicated swimming pool area integrated into the rooftop terrace design.
